component.name: Basitune
component.summary: Lightweight desktop wrapper for YouTube Music

description.p: Basitune is a minimal desktop application that provides a dedicated window for YouTube Music. It uses the system's native webview instead of bundling a browser, making it lightweight and efficient.

ul.li: Persistent login - Your Google/YouTube Music login persists across app restarts
Volume normalization - Automatically adjusts audio levels for consistent playback
Lyrics display - Shows real-time lyrics from Genius
Artist info - AI-generated artist biographies and song context
Window state memory - Remembers window size, position, and maximized state
Single instance - Only one app instance can run at a time
Cross-platform - Runs on Linux, Windows, and macOS
